word: The spirit of antichrist is developing rapidly. Soon there will be a time when those who follow their own human nature, who manifest a love for supremacy, will be found to be on the losing side. The Lord has abased kings, and He will say to all who, while professing to serve Him, . . . make a display and depart from His counsel: "What doest thou to declare My law, while thou thyself livest in transgression?" . . .
